summary: Arnel is a Dunmer Ghost, available as a follower. He\'s a Spellsword, which you can find at Alchemist\'s Shack. He\'s also essential, which means he cannot be killed.
descriptionHtml:
Arnel is a Dark Elf Spellsword, who prefers using the Fireball spell, but when it comes to close combat, he fights with a sword. You can find him at the Alchemist\'s shack. He already has a Dwarven sword in his inventory. Arnel levels up with your character, too. He isn\'t marriable at the moment. You don\'t have to do any quests, in order to get him. If you want me to add more spells to his spell list, just let me know. Arnel is also essential, which means he cannot be killed.

Please tell me if you want me to make him a different class.

Spell list:
- Flames
- Frostbite
- Firebolt
- Ice spike
- Fireball
- Ice storm
- Healing

Installation:
- Unzip the ArnelGhostFollower archive in the Skyrim/Data folder. Make sure you check the ArnelGhostFollower.esp in Data files when you start up Skyrim.

This is my first mod, so I\'m sorry if the description is not good enough.
If there are any problems with the mod, please let me know.
author: MrNinzas
